pageProduct.name: OGX Biotin & Collagen Conditioner 385ml
pageProduct.description:
Information

Hair has a life of it's own and OGX wants to make sure it's a full life. Each innovative salon quality formula is made with on-trend ingredients to help hair shine, move, curl up, hold tight - whatever sets its personality free. The collections are fun and the choices never end.

In the world of haircare, no other brand has hair looking, smelling, and feeling like this. OGX is WHAT HAIR WANTS

General Information

OGX Biotin & Collagen Conditioner helps to infuse nutrients into every strand and creates the appearance of thicker, fuller, healthier looking hair.

OGX Thick & Full Biotin & Collagen Conditioner
Why You Want It... Discover thicker, fuller and more abundant looking hair! This hair thickening conditioner helps to thicken and texturize any hair type! Immerse your thin, skinny strands in this super volumizing blend to help create fuller looking, shiny hair!

An exclusive blend with Vitamin B7 biotin, collagen, and hydrolyzed wheat protein, helps to infuse nutrients into every strand and creates the appearance of thicker, fuller, healthier looking hair.


  • Thickening Biotin & Collagen conditioner

  • Perfect for thin, fine hair

  • Sulfate free sufactants, (sodium lauryl sulfate) SLS free

  • Not tested on animals

Size: 385mL

Shelf Life in Days: 912 days

KEY FEATURES

• Thick & Full
• Biotin & Collagen Conditoner
• Thicker, Fuller, Healthier Looking Hair


Warnings

Avoid contact with eyes. If contact occurs rinse immediately.

Ingredients

Water, Behentrimonium Chloride, Cetearyl Alcohol, Cetyl Alcohol, Glycerin, PPG-3 Benzyl Ether Myristate, Steareth-20, Amodimethicone. Fragrance, Sodium Benzoate, Polyquaternium-47, Disodium EDTA, Citric Acid, Polyquaternium-37, Propylene Glycol Dicaprylate/Dicaprate, PPG-1 Trideceth-6, Biotin, Hydrolyzed Collagen, Hydrolyzed Wheat Protein, Laurdimonium Hydroxypropyl Hydrolyzed Keratin, CI 60730, CI 17200.

Directions

After shampooing, apply conditioner generously to hair, working through to ends. Wait 3-5 minutes. Rinse hair thoroughly. For best results use in conjunction with other OGX products.
